# Sample Skill

This is a test skill for verifying skill discovery.

## When to Use

Use this skill when testing the memento plugin's component discovery.

## Instructions

1. First, verify the skill is loaded
2. Then, check the token count
3. Finally, validate the output

## Reference

| Term | Definition |
|------|------------|
| Test | A verification procedure |
| Skill | A loadable context file |
